data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tauber, Catherine A., Flint, Oliver S. (2010): Resolution of some taxonomic and nomenclatural issues in a recent revision of Ceraeochrysa (Neuroptera: Chrysopidae). Zootaxa 2565: 55-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.294309
